description: This table contains metadata about clinical notes retrieved from external sources. Each row represents a discrete clinical note received in this document.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: NOTE_REFERENCE_IDENT
columns.description: The reference ID of the clinical note, which uniquely identifies the note.

columns.name: NOTE_EXTERNAL_UNIQUE_IDENT
columns.description: The externally-assigned globally unique identifier for the clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_LOCAL_UNIQUE_IDENT
columns.description: The locally-assigned unique identifier for the clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_FHIR_DOCREF_RESRC_IDENT
columns.description: The logical ID of the FHIR Document Reference resource for the clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_FHIR_DOCREF_ATTACHT_URL
columns.description: The URL containing the content of the clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_SOURCE_ORG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the organization record that represents the original source of this clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_SOURCE_ORG_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: NOTE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current status of the clinical note.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Incomplete


Signed


Addendum


Deleted


Revised


Cosigned


Finalized


Unsigned


Cosign Needed


Incomplete Revision


Cosign Needed Addendum


Shared

columns.name: NOTE_SHARED_WITH_PAT_YN
columns.description:
Indicator of whether the clinical note was allowed to be shared with the patient at the source organization for the note. A Yes value does not imply the patient has actually viewed the note.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: NOTE_UCN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mapped type of the clinical note in the Unified Clinical Notes framework. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries:

Consults


Procedures


H&P

ED Notes

columns.name: NOTE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The free-text description of the type of the clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_LAST_FILED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the clinical note was last meaningfully modified at the note's source organization.

columns.name: NOTE_CREATION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the clinical note was originally created at the note's source organization.

columns.name: NOTE_LAST_SIGNED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the clinical note was most recently signed or co-signed.

columns.name: NOTE_LAST_SIGNER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the individual that most recently signed or co-signed the clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_AUTHOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the author of the clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_AUTHOR_TYPE
columns.description: The free-text description of the type of provider that authored the clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_AUTHOR_SERVICE
columns.description: The free-text description of the service associated with the authorship of the clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_AUTHOR_SPECIALTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mapped provider specialty of the author of the clinical note.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: NOTE_AUTHOR_SPECIALTY_NAME
columns.description: The free-text description of the provider specialty of the author of the clinical note.

columns.name: AUTORECONCILED_UCN_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record automatically created in the local chart from this received clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_FILTER_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason this external clinical note should be filtered and thus not auto-reconciled into the local chart. Calculated at the time the note is received and saved.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Claim Derivation: Procedure Code Inclusion/Exclusion List


Claim Derivation: Missing Provider


Claim Derivation: Sensitive Diagnosis


Claim Derivation: Missing Procedure Start Date


Claim Derivation: Excluded Procedure Modifier


Source Organization Unknown


Source Organization Mismatch


Source Organization Is Self


Clinical Note Type Exclusion List


Clinical Note Missing Service Instant


Clinical Note Missing Last Filed Instant


Clinical Note Missing Author Name


Dispense Cancellation


Same Day as Internal Encounter


Missing or Invalid Binary URL


Filtered or Missing Source Note


DocumentReference Status not Current


Claim Derivation: Excluded Linked Diagnoses


Claim Derivation: Missing Encounter Start Date

columns.name: NOTE_ASSOC_EVENT_IDENT
columns.description: The reference ID of the encounter associated with the clinical note. Is associated with a value from I DXR 8010.

columns.name: NOTE_SERVICE_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of service associated with the clinical note.

columns.name: NOTE_SRC_DOCREF_RESRC_IDENT
columns.description: The ID of the FHIR Document Reference resource for the source note of the clinical note. Populated when the clinical note is an interval note.

columns.name: NOTE_REMOVED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the note is no longer in the received note list


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NOTE_SHARED_WITH_PAT_YN
